card.name: Act of Heroism
card.property: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On every plane, there are those who run toward danger." —Gideon Jura

card.name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
card.property: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving."

card.name: Akroma's Vengeance
card.property: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Many must die for the one who should not have perished."

card.name: Angelic Page
card.property: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

card.name: Armageddon
card.property: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Auramancer
card.property: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

card.name: Cloudshift
card.property: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even storm clouds bow to worship Avacyn." —Elder Rimheit

card.name: Congregate
card.property: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing." —Song of All, canto 642

card.name: Darien, King of Kjeldor
card.property: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With his dream of unification fulfilled, Darien became the last king of Kjeldor. Those who followed were known as the kings of New Argive." —Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

card.name: Dauntless Cathar
card.property: {1} {W}, Exile Dauntless Cathar from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The harder they try to extinguish my faith, the brighter it burns in the darkness."

card.name: Decree of Justice
card.property: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying. Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Disenchant
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tools of evil are mere things. And like all things, they cannot last forever." —Song of All, canto 881

card.name: Fencing Ace
card.property: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

card.name: Fiend Hunter
card.property: When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature. When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Geist of the Moors
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The battle is won. There's work to be done. / The Blessed Sleep must wait. / A fiend is about. It stalks the devout. / I'll save them from my fate." —"The Good Geist's Vow"

card.name: Gods Willing
card.property: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

card.name: Griffin Protector
card.property: Flying Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Griffin Protector gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The drums of war stir the hearts of all who fight for righteousness.

card.name: Karona's Zealot
card.property: Morph {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Karona's Zealot is turned face up, all damage that would be dealt to it this turn is dealt to target creature instead.

card.name: Knight of the Skyward Eye
card.property: {3} {G}: Knight of the Skyward Eye gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Order of the Skyward Eye does the bidding of an evil force, unwittingly stirring fear and mistrust across Bant in accordance with his plans.

card.name: Kongming, "Sleeping Dragon"
card.property: Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such a lord as this—all virtues' height—Had never been, nor ever was again."

card.name: Kor Firewalker
card.property: Protection from red Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A river of lava is just another river to cross."

card.name: Loyal Sentry
card.property: When Loyal Sentry blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Loyal Sentry.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His watch ends only when he does.

card.name: Luminarch Ascension
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if you didn't lose life this turn, you may put a quest counter on Luminarch Ascension. (Damage causes loss of life.) {1}{W}: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying. Activate this ability only if Luminarch Ascension has four or more quest counters on it.

card.name: Lunarch Mantle
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}, Sacrifice a permanent: This creature gains flying until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A boon from the angels should never be cast aside." —Manfried Ulmach, Chief Inquisitor

card.name: Noble Templar
card.property: Vigilance Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Nyx-Fleece Ram
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gods are fascinated by innocence, perhaps because it's a quality they themselves lack.

card.name: Ordeal of Heliod
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod. When you sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod, you gain 10 life.

card.name: Pacifism
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

card.name: Path of Peace
card.property: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Hedrax stepped into oblivion, he welcomed unwavering silence.

card.name: Promise of Bunrei
card.property: When a creature you control dies, sacrifice Promise of Bunrei. If you do, create four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not afraid to die today nor afraid of what death will bring."

card.name: Renewed Faith
card.property: You gain 6 life. Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Renewed Faith, you may gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Skepticism fades in the face of the miraculous.

card.name: Rest in Peace
card.property: When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards. If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some corpses the Golgari cannot claim. Some souls the Orzhov cannot shackle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One alone is fearsome; one among many is unstoppable."—Benalish proverb

card.name: Squadron Hawk
card.property: Flying When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
card.property: First strike Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thraben is our home and I will not see it fall to this unhallowed horde."

card.name: Urbis Protector
card.property: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Guilds be damned. We can fend for ourselves." —Vennick of the Gateless

card.name: Valor in Akros
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no stronger armor than the bravery of those beside you.

card.name: Whitemane Lion
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."

card.name: Accumulated Knowledge
card.property: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you." —Takara, to Eladamri

card.name: Arcane Denial
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Bident of Thassa
card.property: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. {1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.

card.name: Blue Elemental Blast
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target red spell. • Destroy target red permanent.

card.name: Blue Sun's Zenith
card.property: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Origin Query will wait. We must ensure we survive to return to it." —Pelyus, vedalken ordinar

card.name: Borrowing 100,000 Arrows
card.property: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kongming and Lu Su tricked Wei troops into shooting over 100,000 arrows at them to later use against the Wei at Red Cliffs.

card.name: Brainstorm
card.property: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Brine Elemental
card.property: Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Brine Elemental is turned face up, each opponent skips his or her next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Water calls to water, and the world is left exhausted and withered in its wake.

card.name: Choking Tethers
card.property: Tap up to four target creatures. Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Choking Tethers, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Coralhelm Guide
card.property: {4} {U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She knows every step of this coastline, both above and below the surface, and she has hideouts all along the way. She will get you there."—Jori En, expedition leader

card.name: Counterspell
card.property: Counter target spell.

card.name: Court Hussar
card.property: Vigilance When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {W} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Curiosity
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All Mirri wanted to do was rest, but she couldn't ignore a nagging suspicion as she followed Crovax's skulking form.

card.name: Cursecatcher
card.property: Sacrifice Cursecatcher: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of all the things that can be stolen, opportunity is the most valuable."

card.name: Dragon's Eye Savants
card.property: Morph—Reveal a blue card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Dragon's Eye Savants is turned face up, look at target opponent's hand.

card.name: Exclude
card.property: Counter target creature spell. Draw a card.

card.name: Fathom Seer
card.property: Morph—Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

card.name: Flash
card.property: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by up to {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No tactic transforms a battle like a well-timed carnivore.

card.name: Freed from the Real
card.property: Enchant creature {U}: Tap enchanted creature. {U}: Untap enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a strong mind moves, form and energy shift to heed it.

card.name: Genju of the Falls
card.property: Enchant Island {2}: Enchanted Island becomes a 3/2 blue Spirit creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land. When enchanted Island is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Falls from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ghost Ship
card.property: Flying {U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Going down with the ship is just the beginning.

card.name: Horseshoe Crab
card.property: {U}: Untap Horseshoe Crab.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the final days before the disaster, all the crabs on Tolaria migrated from inlets, streams, and ponds back to the sea. No one took note.

card.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
card.property: +2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library. 0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order. −1: Return target creature to its owner's hand. −12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.

card.name: Jalira, Master Polymorphist
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonlegendary creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can become anything if I just put my mind to it."

card.name: Man-o'-War
card.property: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch." —Naimah, Femeref philosopher

card.name: Merfolk Looter
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

card.name: Murder of Crows
card.property: Flying Whenever another creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even more than carrion, they crave the last words of the dying.

card.name: Mystic of the Hidden Way
card.property: Mystic of the Hidden Way can't be blocked. Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are no obstacles, only different paths."

card.name: Pact of Negation
card.property: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who expect betrayal at every turn are seldom disappointed.

card.name: Phantasmal Bear
card.property: When Phantasmal Bear becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all." —Pol Jamaar, illusionist

card.name: Reef Worm
card.property: When Reef Worm dies, create a 3/3 blue Fish creature token with "When this creature dies, create a 6/6 blue Whale creature token with 'When this creature dies, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.'"

card.name: Retraction Helix
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the geometries of the world collapse, a master of the Aether can harvest power beyond comprehending.

card.name: Shoreline Ranger
card.property: Flying Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Sift
card.property: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Twice I have let the Legacy slip away. Never again." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Totally Lost
card.property: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Twisted Image
card.property: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "True strength is in the mind, for the body is too malleable a form." —Politus, vedalken emisar

card.name: Vendilion Clique
card.property: Flash Flying When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

card.name: Vesuvan Shapeshifter
card.property: As Vesuvan Shapeshifter enters the battlefield or is turned face up, you may choose another creature on the battlefield. If you do, until Vesuvan Shapeshifter is turned face down, it becomes a copy of that creature and gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may turn this creature face down." Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Willbender
card.property: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

card.name: Ancient Craving
card.property: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Bloodhunter Bat
card.property: Flying When Bloodhunter Bat enters the battlefield, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It returns eager to share the feast of blood and gore with its ghoulish master.

card.name: Caustic Tar
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target player loses 3 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spite of the Cabal turned meadow into mire.

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.property: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Deadly Designs
card.property: {2}: Put a plot counter on Deadly Designs. Any player may activate this ability. When there are five or more plot counters on Deadly Designs, sacrifice it. If you do, destroy up to two target creatures.

card.name: Death's-Head Buzzard
card.property: Flying When Death's-Head Buzzard dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Infested with vermin, ever hungering, dropping from night's sky.

card.name: Diabolic Edict
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Dirge of Dread
card.property: All creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Dirge of Dread, you may have target creature gain fear until end of turn.

card.name: Disfigure
card.property: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Brave scar or unfortunate tale? It all depends on your pain threshold."

card.name: Doomsday
card.property: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Dusk Legion Zealot
card.property: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once they reached Orazca, the Legion's explorers ransacked tombs and temples, hunting for the Immortal Sun.

card.name: Erg Raiders
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their skills are extensive, and their appetite for battle just as vast.

card.name: Fallen Angel
card.property: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me."

card.name: Hell's Caretaker
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The rules are clear. If you want to leave, you need only convince another to take your place."

card.name: Horror of the Broken Lands
card.property: Whenever you cycle or discard another card, Horror of the Broken Lands gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It feeds on dry bones in the sand and desperate pleas in the wind.

card.name: Ihsan's Shade
card.property: Protection from white

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No mortal could atone for Ihsan's betrayal. Redemption required him to become something else.

card.name: Laquatus's Champion
card.property: When Laquatus's Champion enters the battlefield, target player loses 6 life. When Laquatus's Champion leaves the battlefield, that player gains 6 life. {B}: Regenerate Laquatus's Champion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chainer's dark gift to a darker soul.

card.name: Living Death
card.property: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Mesmeric Fiend
card.property: When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Murder
card.property: Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how busy my schedule gets, I always try to take time for that personal touch." — Queen Marchesa

card.name: Nezumi Cutthroat
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Nezumi Cutthroat can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These nezumi, they disgust me. The things they will do for money no other thinking creature would consider. This, of course, makes them useful beyond words." —Meloku the Clouded Mirror

card.name: Phyrexian Ghoul
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

card.name: Phyrexian Obliterator
card.property: Trample Whenever a source deals damage to Phyrexian Obliterator, that source's controller sacrifices that many permanents.

card.name: Plague Wind
card.property: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The second wind of ascension is Reaver, slaying the unworthy." —Keld Triumphant

card.name: Ratcatcher
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may search your library for a Rat card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An ogre's poisonous stench is like fine Kashkaval cheese to the noses lowest to the ground.

card.name: Ravenous Chupacabra
card.property: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Opening Orazca unleashed more horrors than just the Immortal Sun.

card.name: Relentless Rats
card.property: Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats. A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

card.name: Returned Phalanx
card.property: Defender {1}{U}: Returned Phalanx can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They lived in different nations and fought in different eras, but as the Returned, they link arms as one.

card.name: Ruthless Ripper
card.property: Deathtouch Morph—Reveal a black card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Ruthless Ripper is turned face up, target player loses 2 life.

card.name: Street Wraith
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Cycling—Pay 2 life. (Pay 2 life, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.

card.name: Supernatural Stamina
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All are not equal—neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity." —Senifet, vizier of Bontu

card.name: Triskaidekaphobia
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one — • Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player gains 1 life. • Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player loses 1 life.

card.name: Twisted Abomination
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Undead Gladiator
Unearth
card.property: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter how deep you bury it, some evil refuses to stay dead.

card.name: Vampire Lacerator
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

card.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On dark nights you can still see the light of the Vess girl's lantern out in the Caligo, seeking her lost brother. Those who follow are doomed to join her endless search." —"The Fall of the House of Vess"

card.name: Zombify
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it." —Mystic elder

card.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
card.property: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now that's dangerous."

card.name: Act of Treason
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison." —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Akroma, Angel of Fury
card.property: Akroma, Angel of Fury can't be countered. Flying, trample, protection from white and from blue {R}: Akroma, Angel of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Morph {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Balduvian Horde
card.property: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We earn no medals and fight for no titles. Blood is the proof of our victory." —Lovisa Coldeyes

card.name: Ball Lightning
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.) Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most frightening storms are those not woven by nature's hand."

card.name: Blood Moon
card.property: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

card.name: Browbeat
card.property: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the threat of power has power." —Jeska, warrior adept

card.name: Chandra's Outrage
card.property: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

card.name: Chartooth Cougar
card.property: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Cinder Storm
card.property: Cinder Storm deals 7 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any pyromancer can summon fire with a thought. The trick is putting it out.

card.name: Crimson Mage
card.property: {R}: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We wield the fires of rage. War is our blood and destruction our birthright." —Crimson creed

card.name: Eidolon of the Great Revel
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, Eidolon of the Great Revel deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Enthralling Victor
card.property: When Enthralling Victor enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you stare at the sun for too long, you'll lose your ability to see clearly.

card.name: Fortune Thief
card.property: Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead. Morph {R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Frenzied Goblin
card.property: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

card.name: Genju of the Spires
card.property: Enchant Mountain {2}: Enchanted Mountain becomes a 6/1 red Spirit creature until end of turn. It's still a land. When enchanted Mountain is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Spires from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Goblin War Drums
card.property: Creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their eardrums may have given out, but the rest of them never will.

card.name: Hordeling Outburst
card.property: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Humble Defector
card.property: {T}: Draw two cards. Target opponent gains control of Humble Defector. Activate this ability only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You were once Mardu, so your body and will are strong. Now we must train your mind." —Houn, Jeskai elder

card.name: Imperial Recruiter
card.property: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A passionate recruiter will win a war before the first arrow flies.

card.name: Ire Shaman
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Megamorph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.) When Ire Shaman is turned face up, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Izzet Chemister
card.property: Haste {R}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Jackal Pup
card.property: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first morning after acquiring her familiar, the wizard awoke with fleabites and mange.

card.name: Kindle
card.property: Kindle deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.property: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sparkmage shrieked, calling on the rage of the storms of his youth. To his surprise, the sky responded with a fierce energy he'd never thought to see again.

card.name: Magus of the Wheel
card.property: {1} {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Wheel: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fate is not as fixed as you might think."

card.name: Mogg Flunkies
card.property: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

card.name: Pillage
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The embers of our homes still smolder, and already the villages of Kjeldor burn in retaliation. What they have started, we will finish." — Lovisa Coldeyes

card.name: Pyre Hound
card.property: Trample Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Pyre Hound.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its growl is the crackling and popping of a wildfire untamed.

card.name: Pyroclasm
card.property: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

card.name: Red Elemental Blast
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target blue spell. • Destroy target blue permanent.

card.name: Simian Spirit Guide
card.property: Exile Simian Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's rarely worth questioning where the mana comes from. Just be grateful." —Jaya Ballard, task mage

card.name: Skeletonize
card.property: Skeletonize deals 3 damage to target creature. When a creature dealt damage this way dies this turn, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token with "{B}: Regenerate this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire burns away both flesh and freedom.

card.name: Skirk Commando
card.property: Whenever Skirk Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature that player controls. Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Soulbright Flamekin
card.property: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

card.name: Spikeshot Goblin
card.property: {R}, {T}: Spikeshot Goblin deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Proximity discouraged. Do not approach." —Vulshok field guide

card.name: Thresher Lizard
card.property: Thresher Lizard gets +1/+2 as long as you have one or fewer cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sound of its plated tail beating on desert rocks is often mistaken for the footfalls of a much larger predator.

card.name: Trumpet Blast
card.property: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

card.name: Uncaged Fury
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's right to fear those that you keep locked away." —Rahilda, Vildin-Pack alpha

card.name: Zada, Hedron Grinder
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Zada, Hedron Grinder, copy that spell for each other creature you control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: X"A hedron holds magic for a thousand years—or less, if need be."

card.name: Ainok Survivalist
card.property: Megamorph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.) When Ainok Survivalist is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

card.name: Ambassador Oak
card.property: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.

card.name: Ancient Stirrings
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (Cards with no colored mana in their mana costs are colorless. Lands are also colorless.)

card.name: Arbor Elf
card.property: {T}: Untap target Forest.

card.name: Azusa, Lost but Seeking
card.property: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."

card.name: Broodhatch Nantuko
card.property: Whenever Broodhatch Nantuko is dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens. Morph {2}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Colossal Dreadmaw
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

card.name: Courser of Kruphix
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play the top card of your library if it's a land card. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Cultivate
card.property: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

card.name: Echoing Courage
card.property: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single seed unleashes a flurry of growth.

card.name: Elvish Aberration
card.property: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool. Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Elvish Piper
card.property: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more. —Elvish teaching

card.name: Ember Weaver
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each night, the sun unravels and blows away. Each day, the spiders set a new one in the sky." —Sunseeder myth

card.name: Epic Confrontation
card.property: Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter the timeline, some legends will endure.

card.name: Fierce Empath
card.property: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Giant Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the most effective tactics stand the test of time." —Gamelen, Citanul Elder

card.name: Invigorate
card.property: If you control a Forest, rather than pay Invigorate's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life. Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Iwamori of the Open Fist
card.property: Trample When Iwamori of the Open Fist enters the battlefield, each opponent may put a legendary creature card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Kavu Climber
card.property: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kavu might be above you –Llanowar expression meaning "keep an open mind"

card.name: Kavu Predator
card.property: Trample Whenever an opponent gains life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Kavu Predator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a withered world, the scent of healthy prey is enough to drive a predator to frenzy.

card.name: Krosan Colossus
card.property: Morph {6}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it walked, it altered geography. When it bellowed, it changed the weather.

card.name: Krosan Tusker
card.property: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Living Wish
card.property: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best wishes include the will to tame their consequences.

card.name: Lull
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The clamor of war ceased as both armies stood and marveled at the beauty of Gaea's work.

card.name: Master of the Wild Hunt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. {T}: Tap all untapped Wolf creatures you control. Each Wolf tapped this way deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power divided as its controller chooses among any number of those Wolves.

card.name: Nettle Sentinel
card.property: Nettle Sentinel doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you cast a green spell, you may untap Nettle Sentinel.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though Shadowmoor's monster-haunted wilds beckon, she never leaves her post.

card.name: Plummet
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind." —Dejara, Giltwood druid

card.name: Presence of Gond
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

card.name: Protean Hulk
card.property: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total converted mana cost 6 or less and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rancor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample. When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

card.name: Regrowth
card.property: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Stampede Driver
card.property: {1} {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The thunder of hooves is music to my ears."

card.name: Summoner's Pact
card.property: Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{G}{G}. If you don't, you lose the game.

card.name: Timberpack Wolf
card.property: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The need for the pack is bred in their bones. Their true strength will not show itself for any other purpose." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Tree of Redemption
card.property: Defender {T}: Exchange your life total with Tree of Redemption's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The executioner's tree in Thraben Cathedral holds the power to absolve more than the souls of the hanged.

card.name: Utopia Sprawl
card.property: Enchant Forest As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of the chosen color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

card.name: Vessel of Nascency
card.property: {1} {G}, Sacrifice Vessel of Nascency: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Wildheart Invoker
card.property: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us." —The Invokers' Tales

card.name: Woolly Loxodon
card.property: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even among the hardiest warriors of the Temur, loxodons are respected for their adaptation to the mountain snows.

card.name: Animar, Soul of Elements
card.property: Protection from white and from black Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Animar, Soul of Elements. Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Animar.

card.name: Baloth Null
card.property: When Baloth Null enters the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Humans use pigs to hunt for mushrooms, don't they? It's like that." —Harak, Malakir bloodwitch

card.name: Blightning
card.property: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player. That player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While the smell of burning flesh is common in Grixis, the odor of smoldering brain matter is a rare treat.

card.name: Boros Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player. • Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn. • Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Brion Stoutarm
card.property: Lifelink {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature other than Brion Stoutarm: Brion Stoutarm deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boggarts and disturbing bits of boggarts flew through the air with alarming and untidy regularity.

card.name: Cloudblazer
card.property: Flying When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the aether charts in the world can't compete with the trained eye of a talented scout.

card.name: Conflux

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After years of world-bending machinations, Bolas's triumph is at hand.

card.name: Eladamri's Call
card.property: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tribal rivalries and petty disputes were laid aside at Eladamri's summons.

card.name: Gisela, Blade of Goldnight
card.property: Flying, first strike If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead. If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

card.name: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden
card.property: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {2}: Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a creature card with power less than or equal to Grenzo's power, put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."

card.name: Lorescale Coatl
card.property: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The enlightenment I never found in etherium I have found traced in the coatl's scales."—Ranalus, vedalken heretic

card.name: Mystic Snake
card.property: Flash When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

card.name: Nicol Bolas
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}. Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards his or her hand.

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
card.property: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to target creature or player. {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Notion Thief
card.property: Flash If an opponent would draw a card except the first one he or she draws in each of his or her draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

card.name: Pernicious Deed
card.property: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."

card.name: Pillory of the Sleepless
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Which is worse—the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

card.name: Prossh, Skyraider of Kher
card.property: Flying When you cast Prossh, Skyraider of Kher, create X 0/1 red Kobold creature tokens named Kobolds of Kher Keep, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast Prossh. Sacrifice another creature: Prossh gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Quicksilver Dagger
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player. You draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."

card.name: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed
card.property: Vigilance, reach Ruric Thar, the Unbowed attacks each combat if able. Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

card.name: Shadowmage Infiltrator
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Stangg
card.property: When Stangg enters the battlefield, create a legendary 3/4 red and green Human Warrior creature token named Stangg Twin. When Stangg leaves the battlefield, exile that token. When that token leaves the battlefield, sacrifice Stangg.

card.name: Vindicate
card.property: Destroy target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

card.name: Assembly-Worker
card.property: {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With their factories long destroyed, some of Mishra's creations still toil in remote areas, endlessly performing and reperforming their last orders.

card.name: Chalice of the Void
card.property: Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

card.name: Coalition Relic
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Ensnaring Bridge
card.property: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I said I needed a hand, I didn't mean this." —Gerrard Capashen

card.name: Heavy Arbalest
Nihil Spellbomb
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard. When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Perilous Myr
card.property: When Perilous Myr dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To Mirrodin, an explosive. To Phyrexia, a missionary.

card.name: Primal Clay
card.property: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

card.name: Prophetic Prism
card.property: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."

card.name: Sai of the Shinobi

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The passing of the sai presages the end of the old clan and the ascent of the new.

card.name: Self-Assembler
card.property: When Self-Assembler enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Assembly-Worker creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It sees itself in all of its creations.

card.name: Strionic Resonator
card.property: {2}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its tines cannot be rung by mere physical force. Only magic of great power can start its eldritch resonance.

card.name: Sundering Titan
card.property: When Sundering Titan enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even if we defeat it, what remains to be saved?" —Glissa Sunseeker

card.name: Swiftfoot Boots
card.property: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is great wisdom in rushing headlong into combat … if you're prepared." —Kenjek, captain of the Thousand Swords

card.name: Treasure Keeper
card.property: When Treasure Keeper dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card with converted mana cost 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Ash Barrens
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Cascade Bluffs
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {U/R}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{R}, or {R}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Travelers bathe in the falls to wash away curses from the pucas who lurk nearby.

card.name: Fetid Heath
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {W/B}, {T}: Add {W}{W}, {W}{B}, or {B}{B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not linger in such places, child. There the gwyllions dance. If they find you, you will join in their revels for eternity." —Talara, elvish safewright

card.name: Flooded Grove
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {G/U}, {T}: Add {G}{G}, {G}{U}, or {U}{U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At full moon, the river seeps over its banks and crawls through the woods like a blanket of serpents.

card.name: Haunted Fengraf
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Haunted Fengraf: Return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Mikokoro, Center of the Sea
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Center of the Sea, Eye of the World, Shrine of Enlightenment. Seek it for answers. Seek it for healing. Seek it and return transformed." —Scroll fragment from the ruins of Minamo

card.name: Mishra's Factory
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Myriad Landscape
card.property: Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Pendelhaven
card.property: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The limbs of Pendelhaven extend as far as the meek roam, and reach as high as they strive.

card.name: Quicksand
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all deaths are etched with mythic meaning and iconic glory.

card.name: Rishadan Port
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Tap target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rishada is the gateway to free trade—but the key will cost you.

card.name: Rugged Prairie
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {R/W}, {T}: Add {R}{R}, {R}{W}, or {W}{W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hobs bury their kin far from home. They believe the dry, open ground keeps hags from stealing the bones and gwyllions from stealing the spirits.

card.name: Twilight Mire
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {B/G}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{G}, or {G}{G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As their roots soaked in a weak tea of bogwater and decay, the trees absorbed the essence of death into their living tissue.

card.name: Zoetic Cavern
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
